metadata.title: THE NORTH FACE Storm Strike III WP - Men's
features: Made in the USA or Imported

BUILT FOR TOUGH CONDITIONS. Explore the winter world with confidence and comfort in the Men's Storm Strike III Waterproof Boots. With synthetic insulation, durable waterproof uppers, and rugged outsoles, they'll take you through snow, mud, and rain.

WATERPROOF DURABILITY. Constructed with a synthetic leather upper, this boot boasts a modern design featuring waterproof, DryVent technology. Hike, splash and explore comfortably in even the nastiest conditions with this boot's premium features.

PREMIUM INSULATION. Take on the cold with superior warmth. Featuring 200 grams of our patented synthetic insulation, you'll remain warm and protected when the nasty weather hits as you explore the chilly winter landscape.

OUTDOOR VERSATILITY. Never Stop Exploring with thoughtful features that help you go further — a single-density hiking midsole and outsole provide support and impact management, while the super-soft collar provides a comfortable buffer against the outside.

TAKE ON THE DAY. An essential closet staple, this boot is a go-to classic for any exploration. Pair it with your favorite hiking or snow pants, and proudly wear the badge of exploration with The North Face.
